review: setup is easy and aside from the power cord requirements, the stick works well for streaming videos.  i really only have one complaint, but since it's the reason for me purchasing this product, it's kind of a big deal.i purchased this as i travel for work every week and wanted to be able to take my shows on the go when i'm in hotel rooms instead of watching video on my iphone or ipad, which obviously have much smaller screens.  when i used this in an older hotel that didn't have an integrated hotel/tv system (ie includes hotel info, pay per view options, etc), the stick worked just fine.  when i used this in a modern hotel with those aspects, i found that the input function is disabled on those tvs, so you can't switch from the cable to hdmi input...  which is a HUGE problem since the stick plugs into the hdmi port.  you can ask the hotel to enable the input function, but from my experience at two hotels, the hotel either does not know how to or the hotel does not want to, since they would have to disable it again once you've checked out, and it's kind of a hassle...it works just fine with my tv at home, but i already have a smart tv so all my streaming is already integrated into my tv and i don't really need an additional stick to access my shows.if anyone has any workarounds for the input issue, please let me know!
